channel.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
channel.description: Up-to-date information on travel in the Upper Midwest

item.title: Itasca in winter
item.description: After snow flies, visitors zip around Minnesota's beloved state park on skis and snowshoes.

item.title: Cheap winter getaways
item.description: Here are 20 places where a fun weekend is easy on the wallet.

item.title: 50 great girlfriend getaways
item.description: Looking for ideas? Here are fun trips for every season.

item.title: 12 months of girlfriend getaways
item.description: Here are the best places to go for a good time in all four seasons.

item.title: 100 best places to vacation
item.description: Here's one traveler's life list for trips in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Iowa and Illinois.

item.title: Living like a pioneer
item.description: At forts, fur posts and frontier homesteads in Minnesota and Wisconsin, kids can live like Laura Ingalls Wilder or Davy Crockett.

item.title: Minnesota's cave country
item.description: In the southeast corner of the state, scratch the surface for a glimpse of splendor.

item.title: Lodgings in Lanesboro
item.description: In this bluff-country bicycling capital, take your choice of B&Bs, small inns and even cabins.

item.title: Heirs to a hideaway
item.description: High above the North Shore, a spot at the historic Tettegouche Camp is as prized as ever.

item.title: Cabin on a waterfall
item.description: On the edge of a waterfall on Minnesota's North Shore, a state-park guesthouse is a prized hideaway.

item.title: Amish country
item.description: In the southeast corner of Minnesota, folks are different, yet not so different.
